title: Beerakaya thokku podi    | Ridge Gourd peel  Podi | Instant | Side Dish
content:
Side Dish: South Indian recipe Servings: 2 Duration: 20 mins Any Indian meal contains Dal, curry, rice, roti and curd it‚Äôs so authentic and traditional to have a meal with curries and it gives you so much satisfaction with happiness. All these curries which I was prepared are the same process following from many generations and learnt from others like grand-grand parents. It‚Äôs like a chain process and love to know more and more from grand parents. Curry is a side dish either wet/ dry prepared out of vegetables/ leafy vegetables. It should be cooked and make sure it contain some amount of nutrients in it for good health diet. You can dip roti in curry and eat, you feel the flavours of it really delicious üòã In South India it‚Äôs common recipe and should be a side dish in every meal, this side dish suits with any fresh hot rice with ghee, if you like to have it with any phulka/ Roti then it‚Äôs great combination üëç Coming to Recipe, I prepared a side dish with Ridge gourd peel.. I hope you like it.. Ingredients:
  • Beerakaya Thokku / Ridge gourd peel - 2 cups
  • Onion - medium- 1 - chopped
  • Dry Red chillies - 3
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Dry coconut powder/ Dessicated powder - 2 tb sp
  • Coriander seeds - 1 tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tb sp
For Tempering:
  • Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/2 tea spoon
  • Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon
  • Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1 tea spoon
  • Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1 tea spoon
  • Curry leaves - 4 to 5
  • Oil - 1 tb sp
Procedure: Prepreparation:
  • Blend red chilly powder, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, dry coconut powder, salt & dry red chillies till smooth paste
  • Chop & blend Ridge gourd peel till smooth paste
  • Take out blended paste in a bowl and Keep it aside
Making Beerakaya Thokku Podi:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil & tempering
  • Saute 30 secs and add chopped onion
  • Saute one minute
  • Mix well and add blended paste
  • Saute 10-12 mins
  • You can see Ridge gourd peel roasted and slightly color changes with nice aroma
  • Beerakaya Thokku Podi is ready to serve
  • While serving Ridge gourd peel powder with rice & ghee
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • Double the ingredients to increase the quantity
  • It tastes good till 3 days.. if you could preserve in refrigerator
  • This Podi is best combination with plain cooked red gram with turmeric powder and salt.. ( Kandi Pappu)
